thread.title: Japan Stocks Get a Dose of China Volatility
thread.title_full: Japan Stocks Get a Dose of China Volatility - WSJ

author: Chao Deng
title: Japan Stocks Get a Dose of China Volatility
text:
Japan stocks fell early Thursday, giving back sharp gains made the previous day as global volatility unsettled regional markets.
The Nikkei Stock Average was off 3.1%, having jumped 7.7% yesterday, the most in nearly seven years.
Asian shares...
